Name: OWASP ZAP
Description: OWASP ZAP is an open-source web application security scanner that helps in finding security vulnerabilities in web applications.
HTU: Install OWASP ZAP, configure the target application, run the scan, and review the results.

Name: Burp Suite
Description: Burp Suite is a popular web vulnerability scanner and security testing toolkit for web applications.
HTU: Install Burp Suite, configure the target URL, run the scan, and analyze the vulnerabilities.

Name: Nikto
Description: Nikto is an open-source web server scanner that performs comprehensive tests against web servers for multiple vulnerabilities.
HTU: Install Nikto, run `nikto -h <target>` to scan the target web server, and review the report.

Name: Acunetix
Description: Acunetix is a web vulnerability scanner that detects and reports on over 4500 web application vulnerabilities.
HTU: Install Acunetix, configure the target web application, run the scan, and review the detailed reports.

Name: Arachni
Description: Arachni is a feature-full, modular, and high-performance web application security scanner framework.
HTU: Install Arachni, configure the target web application, run the scan, and analyze the results.
